summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a birthday dinner and mentioning Bill Daley. The email highlights the informal nature of their communication and includes a confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The email discusses a birthday dinner and mentions Bill Daley as a recognized figure.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email was sent on January 21, 2010, at 10:35 AM.
